status=#{status},

#{id}
update set t_sku set quantity = (quantity-#{quantity}) where id = #{skuId}

update t_order
payTime=#{payTime}, status=#{status},
logisticsNo=#{logisticsNo},
where id = #{id}

update t_sku a inner join ( select t1.skuId,sum(quantity) as quantity from t_order_sku t1 inner join t_order t2 on t1.orderId = t2.id where t2.status = 0 and t2.createTime < date_sub(now(),interval 1 day) group by t1.skuId ) b on a.id = b.skuId set a.quantity = a.quantity + b.quantity
update t_order set status = 6 where createTime < date_sub(now(),interval 1 day) and status = 0

limit #{start},#{rows}

select t1.id,t1.createTime,t1.payTime,t1.payType,t1.freight,t1.no,t1.status, t2.id addressId,t2.phone,t2.address,t2.consignee, t3.quantity,t4.id skuId,t4.discountPrice,t4.standard,t5.mainImgUuid, t6.createTime commetTime,t6.content from t_order t1 left join t_address t2 on t1.addressId = t2.id left join t_order_sku t3 on t1.id = t3.orderId left join t_sku t4 on t3.skuId = t4.id left join t_product t5 on t4.productid = t5.id left join t_comment t6 on t1.id=t6.orderId where t1.id = #{orderId}
